Name: Helena Abadie
Text:
The school is amazing! I cannot say enough about the staff. Ms.Linh is amazing!It truly is a family like environment. The instructors were always incredibly helpful and informative. Highly recommend attending!

Name: Rawand Abed al haq
Text: as an esthetician student I highly recommend attending to 89 Beaty school, the instructors are very informative and helpful, it was a wonderful experience
